text: I first bought this when I was going on a trip and didn't know what the coffee situation would be - these far exceeded my expectations! The flavor is actually better than my machine brewed coffee (but not as good as the Melita drip coffee) and so convenient. I stock up whenever Amazon has these on sale! Great coffee.Starbucks VIA Ready Brew Coffee, Colombia, 3.3-Gram Packages (Pack of 50)
